title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Paint the Town Red, White, and Blue With Independence Day Bonuses
content:
Independence Day festivities have arrived in Southern San Andreas. Log in to receive a trio of appropriately themed Bucket Hats, plus enjoy Independence Day Discounts with 50% off the star-spangled Sovereign motorcycle, Liberator monster truck, and a wide range of patriotic paraphernalia.

There's also a special red, white, and blue wrapped Karin Boor in The Diamondâ€™s lobby that's attainable with either a fortuitous spin of the Lucky Wheel or by completing The Podium Robbery.
